unnormalised: The Maharashtra govt. announced that all govt employees need to link their Aadhaar no. to their employee ID by 30/11/2024. This is to streamline salary disbursement & ensure transparency. Failure to comply might delay salary credits, as per a notification released y'day.
normalised: The Maharashtra government announced that all government employees need to link their Aadhaar number to their employee I-D by thirtieth November two thousand and twenty four. This is to streamline salary disbursement and ensure transparency. Failure to comply might delay salary credits, as per a notification released yesterday.

unnormalised: Also, students appearing for the MH-CET exam this year should remember to carry their Aadhaar cards for verification. Those with discrepancies in their hall ticket & Aadhaar details might face issues. The last date to correct these issues is 15/08/2024.
normalised: Also, students appearing for the M-H-C-E-T exam this year should remember to carry their Aadhaar cards for verification. Those with discrepancies in their hall ticket and Aadhaar details might face issues. The last date to correct these issues is fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: For job seekers, linking your PAN no. to your employment profile on Naukri.com can increase your chances of being considered by employers. Many companies now use this to verify the authenticity of candidates. So, get your PAN details updated asap!
normalised: For job seekers, linking your P-A-N number to your employment profile on Naukri dot com can increase your chances of being considered by employers. Many companies now use this to verify the authenticity of candidates. So, get your P-A-N details updated as soon as possible!
